Package gw.currency.fxrate

package gw.currency.fxrate
  • Class
    Description
    CCDefaultFXRateBuilder
    A builder class for creating instances of DefaultFXRate with specific configurations in ClaimCenter.
    DefaultFXRate
    Represents a default implementation of an FXRate.
    DefaultFXRateBuilder<B extends FXRateBuilder<DefaultFXRate,B>>
    Builder class for DefaultFXRate.
    ExchangeRateInUseDelegateMethods
     
    ExchangeRateInUseDelegateMethodsImpl
     
    FXRate
    Interface for FXRate (Foreign Exchange Rate) FromCurrency -- Currency -- The Currency to be "sold" ToCurrency -- Currency -- The Currency to be "bought" Rate -- BigDecimal -- The conversion rate Market-- FXRateMarket -- The FXRateMarket for which the rate applies MarketTime-- datetime -- The point in time when the market indicated the rate was applicable RetrievedAt-- datetime -- The point in time when the quotation was obtained from an external source
    FXRateBuilder<T extends FXRate,B extends FXRateBuilder<T,B>>
    A builder interface for constructing FXRate instances.
    FXRateContext
    Interface for FXRateContext.
    FXRateContextImpl
    Implements a Foreign Exchange Rate Context.
    FXRateContextImpl.Builder
    Defines a builder for a foreign exchange rate context.
    FXRateConversionUtil
    Methods to replace any owned ExchangeRate entities with their ExchangeRateInUse equivalents.
    FXRateImpl
    Deprecated.
    Use DefaultFXRate or the updated API instead.
    FXRateService
    Interface for the Exchange Rate Service
